MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the TD7 postcode area of Selkirk. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 6pm due to a damaged pole and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 8pm. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4:30PM on Thursday 31 December 2020.
